title: Smart Girl's Guide to Bedding a Virgin
description: She’s tutoring for cash. He’s secretly a virgin. Will their lessons move from the books to between the sheets? Lotte Andersson's incredible GPA has no effect on her mountain of debt. While tutoring is the perfect way for the college student to make ends meet, her rugby-playing clients are nothing but trouble. That's why Lotte can barely contain her surprise when the sweet squad captain scrums into her life. Noah Riley wants to command his team's respect more than anything. There's just one if they knew he was still a virgin, he'd never live it down. When things heat up with his gorgeous tutor, he's completely lost on how to take things from the classroom to the bedroom. With bullies and unchecked bravado aiming to batter their hearts, can Lotte and Noah find a way to score? Smart Girl's Guide to Bedding a Virgin is a standalone New Adult novel in a delightful romantic comedy series. If you like sexual chemistry, hilarious banter, and playful passions, then you'll love Alice Faris’s uproarious novel. Buy Smart Girl's Guide to Bedding a Virgin to play for young love today! author: Alice Faris
